name: Evelyn's Adventure
description:
In order to save her mother, Evelyn, an 18-year-old girl, must disguise herself to hide her gender and be able to participate in the largest knights tournament in the world, which will decide Princess Saraya's fiancé. Marrying her would allow her to have enough money to buy the medicine she needs to save her mother. But she is not strong enough to win, so accompanies Evelyn and Moon Mask, a mysterious thief, through an open world full of interesting locations, a variety of enemies and bosses, and mysteries and surprises. Will you focus solely on winning the tournament or will you spend some time getting to know your partner better and befriending her or even maintaining a relationship with her? And with other girls throughout the world?

• An open world third person 3D fantasy adventure RPG that takes you through a total of 12 biomes.

• A final boss available from the beginning. Explore the world around you, level up, get stronger and when you think you can win the tournament, go to the coliseum and defeat the other participants.

• Multiple protagonists. Switch characters between Evelyn and Moon Mask, and other characters you unlock in the future, master their different fighting styles and combine their skills to perform impressive combos.

• Wide variety of bosses with different attacks and combat styles. Can you find and defeat them all?

• Side missions that lead you to discover new stories and secrets of the world with good rewards.

• Level-up system and shops where you can buy new magic and expertise skills that you can combine as you like to unleash powerful attacks.

• Attractive female characters to meet and with whom you can choose to maintain a simple friendship or sexual relations.

• Up to 2 different endings. Will you unlock the best one or settle for the normal one?

* Customize Evelyn with a variety of skins for your clothes and weapons.

• Collectibles scattered around the open world. Can you get all of them?
